title: Mercury Transit in the 12th House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Mercury transiting the 12th house redirects mental energy toward introspection, isolation, foreign matters, and hidden expenses. Thinking becomes private and reflective, supporting research, planning, and behind-the-scenes work. Communication may reduce outwardly while internal analysis deepens. Expenses linked to travel, health, or documentation can rise if details are ignored. Overthinking can disturb sleep or peace of mind. When managed with structure, this transit supports strategic withdrawal, spiritual study, and quiet progress without unnecessary exposure.

sections.heading: Expenses & Planning
points: Costs linked to travel or health

closing: Mercury in the 12th house favors quiet intelligence and disciplined reflection. Structured thinking converts isolation into strategic clarity.
